title: Best Drugs
lyrics:
I've been sober
Feel like I've been sober all my life
I tread water
And I hold on to things too tight, too tight
Then you come on just like the best drugs, baby

You take over like the best drugs, baby



I love it, I can get so high on you

Tell them they can meet me on the moon

Pull me thru just like the best drugs, baby

Felling like I'm not the only one

Feeling like I'm plugged in to the sun

You come on just like the best drugs, baby



I hear music

Feels like I'm swimming in the sea, in the sea

Just sweet soul music

And it just washes over me

It's all the faith I need



You come on just like the best drugs, baby

You take over like the best drugs, baby



I love it, I can get so high on you

Tell them they can meet me on the moon

Pull me thru just like the best drugs, baby

Felling like I'm not the only one

Feeling like I'm plugged in to the sun

You come on just like the best drugs, baby



I can see the beauty in the mess and imperfections

When you're running through me I get pulled in all directions

Swallowed by the beauty and lost in inspiration



I love it, I can get so high on you

Tell them they can meet me on the moon

Pull me thru just like the best drugs, baby

Felling like I'm not the only one

Feeling like I'm plugged in to the sun

You come on just like the best drugs, baby



I love it, I can get so high on you

Tell them they can meet me on the moon

Pull me thru just like the best drugs, baby

Felling like I'm not the only one

Feeling like I'm plugged in to the sun

You come on just like the best drugs, baby
